Frontend.name: HTML
Frontend.skillsInAction: Created semantic, accessible HTML structures for responsive websites, implemented forms and interactive elements, and ensured cross-browser compatibility.

Frontend.name: CSS
Frontend.skillsInAction: Designed and implemented responsive layouts, used advanced CSS techniques including Flexbox and Grid, and optimized styles for performance and cross-device consistency.

Frontend.name: JavaScript
Frontend.skillsInAction: Built dynamic web applications, handled asynchronous operations with AJAX and Fetch, and utilized modern ES6+ features for code efficiency.

Frontend.name: React
Frontend.skillsInAction: Developed interactive UIs with React components, managed application state using hooks and context, and integrated with RESTful APIs.

Frontend.name: Bootstrap
Frontend.skillsInAction: Utilized Bootstrap to quickly design responsive and mobile-first web pages.

Frontend.name: Tailwind CSS
Frontend.skillsInAction: Applied utility-first CSS framework to create custom, responsive designs efficiently.

Backend.name: Node.js
Backend.skillsInAction: Built server-side applications, created RESTful APIs, and handled asynchronous operations using Node.js's event-driven architecture.

Backend.name: Express.js
Backend.skillsInAction: Developed web applications and APIs with Express.js, managed routing and middleware, and integrated with databases for dynamic content delivery.

Backend.name: MongoDB
Backend.skillsInAction: Designed and managed NoSQL databases, optimized queries, and implemented data models for flexible and scalable applications.

Backend.name: MySQL
Backend.skillsInAction: Developed and managed relational databases, optimized SQL queries, and implemented data integrity constraints for reliable data storage.
